name: Vortex Soccer
description:
Vortex Soccer é um jogo de batidas de falta no qual o objetivo é atingir a pontuação necessária de cada nível para avançar. Porém, o jogador conta com a ajuda de elementos um tanto quanto inusitados para cumprir este objetivo, desde pássaros até portais, com diversas pontuações diferentes.

Vortex Soccer is a freekick game in which the main objective is to reach the necessary score points to get to the next level. In order to reach the goal, the player has the assistance of unused elements such as birds and vortexes with different scores each.

INSTRUCTIONS

To execute a freekick, you should:

1º Set the kick power by clicking on the button "Força da Bica", 
in the lower left corner of the screen.

2º Then, set the height of your kick by clicking on the button
"Altura da Bica", in the lower right corner of the screen.

3º At last, aim with the red arrow, in the direction of your kick.
Click anywhere of the screen to execute the kick.

You will have five chances to reach the goal points for each level.

Good luck and enjoy!
